title: Clothier Voodoo Doll
summaries: The Clothier Voodoo Doll is an accessory that allows the player, Falling Stars, and other NPCs to harm and kill the Clothier NPC. Killing the Clothier at night this way summons Skeletron. The doll has a 0.33*1/300 (0.33%) chance to drop from Angry Bones or Dark Casters in the Dungeon.
The Clothier Voodoo Doll cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have <linked>modifiers</linked>.

statistics.Sell: 2 SC
